snippet: The Japanese company’s sales rose 12 percent, a year after production slowed when the earthquake and tsunami hit Japan.
abstract: Toyota makes big comeback after two years of struggles, helping the auto industry post its best April results in four years; Toyota’s sales in the American market increased 12 percent in April, and its market share climbed to 15 percent, the highest point in 17 months; industry sales rose 2 percent over all.
lead_paragraph: The Japanese company’s sales rose 12 percent, a year after production slowed when the earthquake and tsunami hit Japan.

headline.seo: Toyota Posts Strong April; Other Carmakers’ Sales Mixed
headline.main: Toyota Back in the Game, Auto Sales Are the Best in 4 Years
headline.print_headline: Toyota Back in the Game, Auto Sales Are the Best in 4 Years
